title: 84/158/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 March 1984 provisionally suspending approval of an establishment appearing on the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importation of fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 March 1984
provisionally suspending approval of an establishment appearing on the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importation of fresh meat into the Community
(84/158/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The approval of the Argentine establishment 'COAGRO' (veterinary approval number 2066) listed in the Annex to Decision 84/29/EEC is hereby suspended.
2. The suspension of approval shall remain valid until a final decision is taken in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 30 of Directive 72/462/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 March 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
